Description: This corpus contains texts written by primary and secondary school students (years 7-9).

Corpus: DIALUKI: Diagnosing reading and writing in a second or foreign language
Description: This corpus contains texts both in Finnish (written by Russian native speakers) and English (written by Finnish native speakers).#SEPThe corpus will be made available through Korp.

Corpus: MERLIN Written Learner Corpus for Czech, German, Italian 1.1
Annotation: a wide range of language characteristics that provide researchers with concrete examples of learner performance and progress across multiple proficiency levels.
Description: This corpus contains learner texts produced in standardized language certifications covering CEFR levels A1-C1.#SEPThe corpus is available for download from the Eurac Research CLARIN Centre Repository.

Corpus: Topling - Paths in Second Language Acquisition
Description: This corpus contains written texts in English, Swedish and Finnish produced by students in the Finnish educational system and is an extension of  the CEFLING corpus, which it also includes.#SEPThe corpus is available through the concordancer Korp.
